scripts.start: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network
scripts.network: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:tauri: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network:tauri
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/reproduction.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
